page.title: 18DOMESTIC APPLIANCES
page.content: Throughout the day we use lots of machines operated by electricity.For my breakfast Mum takes the milk from the{fridge}and boils it on the {cooker.}We use the toaster to make {toast.}She boils the{kettle}for hot water. We listen to the{radio. Sometimes my mum uses the{food-mixer {and the yoghurt maker.}While I am at school she cleans the carpets with the {vacuum cleaner,}washes clothes in the{washing machine}and dries them in the{tumble drier}.When I get home from school I watch{television}.Some people have{video recorders}to record programmes.I play games on my{computer or write programs.We use the{telephone for speaking to people.Some people have{microwave ovens}to cook their food quickly when they have taken it from the{deep-freeze.}When I go to bed my {electric blanket}warms my bed.
